step.title: How to start?
step.description: Choose the location you want to start with and click on the corresponding button. Your patient is waiting for you!

step.title: How can I change the position?
step.description: Click the side buttons to move to the place you need!

step.title: Where can I find the prescription data?
step.description: Click on the IPad button to open the Ipad and go to 'Prescription' tab

step.title: Where can I check the patient records?
step.description: In the Ipad there is a 'Records' tab, click on it to open info. To close the IPad, click on the 'Close' button above.

step.title: How to pick items?
step.description: To pick item just click on it. The green arrow above will help you choose the wright one.

step.title: How can I ...?
step.description: Click the purple button to start the action

step.title: How to controle items?
step.description: You should check the medicine before using it. Click the blue button 'Controleren'

step.title: How to open items?
step.description: Click the 'Open' button to unсover things.

step.title: What if I don`t need the item anymore?
step.description: Click the grey side button to put the medicine back on the table

step.title: How can I talk to patients and colleques?
step.description: Don`t forget to communicate with your patients and collegues! Just click on a person or the mark above them to start a dialogue.
